title: Invasion of Space
summary:
A phone game, inspired by the arcade classic “Space Invaders”, made in Unity for a school assignment.

This project was focused on UI design and optimizing the user experience for smartphones. To accomplish the second part, tilt controls were used to steer the player’s ship, and vibrations are triggered for some events that occurred during the gameplay.

The game also includes multiple save-states, that record the player's high score.
developedMechanics: Using tilt controls to move objects in Unity
Using Save Files to save high scores
Simple particle effects with the built in particle system
